alias.description: Specifies the alias of the RDS.

associated_with_ddm.description: Specifies whether the instance is associated with DDM.

backup_used_space.description: Specifies the backup space usage of the RDS. Only supports RDS for SQL Server engine.

cpu.description: Specifies the CPU size of the RDS.

db_user_name.description: Specifies the default username of the RDS.

disk_encryption_id.description: Specifies the disk encryption key ID of the RDS.

enable_ssl.description: Specifies the SSL flag of the instance.

enterprise_project_id.description: Specifies the enterprise project ID of the RDS.

expiration_time.description: Specifies the expiration time of the RDS. Only supports RDS for MySQL engine.

flavor_ref.description: Specifies the flavor of the RDS.

id.description: Specifies the ID of the RDS.

maintenance_window.description: Specifies the maintenance window of the RDS.

max_iops.description: Specifies the maximum IOPS of the disk.

mem.description: Specifies the memory size of the RDS.

name.description: Specifies the name of the RDS.

port.description: Specifies the database port of the RDS.

private_dns_names.description: Specifies the private DNS names of the RDS.

private_ips.description: Specifies the private IP addresses of the RDS.

protected_status.description: Specifies the DBSS opening status of the RDS.

public_ips.description: Specifies the list of public IP addresses of the instance.

read_only_by_user.description: Specifies the user set read-only status of the RDS. Only supports RDS for MySQL engine.

region.description: Specifies the region where the RDS is located.

status.description: Specifies the status of the RDS.

storage_used_space.description: Specifies the disk space usage, unit is GB.

subnet_id.description: Specifies the subnet ID of the RDS.

time_zone.description: Specifies the time zone of the RDS.

type.description: Specifies the type of the RDS.

updated.description: Specifies the update time of the RDS.

keep_days.description: Specifies the number of days that the generated backup files can be saved.

start_time.description: Specifies the backup time period. Automatic backup will be triggered in this period.

block.description: schema:{"Required":true};Specifies the backup policy.

complete_version.description: Specifies the complete version of the database.

block.description: schema:{"Required":true};Specifies the database information.

replication_mode.description: Specifies the replication mode of the RDS.
